lessons.title: Lesson 1

Activity: Fiver Footsteps

Stand up and stomp each number as you count by 5s. Ready?

5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60!

Now clap each time you say one of those numbers. Say it faster. Now whisper it like a spy. Now SHOUT it like a superhero.

Did you feel the rhythm? Thatâ€™s the beat of 5s. You just skip-counted your way through the 5 times tables!

lessons.title: Lesson 2
lessons.reading:
Now itâ€™s time to count by 6s!

Activity: Six-Step Hop

Hop in place and count out loud by sixes: 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48, 54, 60.

Try hopping faster or slower. Can you count backward by sixes? Great job!

Youâ€™re on your way to mastering the 6 times tables.
